metadata.title: CVE-2020-5197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community Edition (CE) and EnterpriseEdition (EE) 5.1 through 12.6.1. It has Incorrect Access Control.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
